title: Most Important Players in the Super Bowl, Plus Reactions to Brian Flores's Lawsuit
description:
Kevin opens by speaking with PFF’s Diante Lee and The Ringer’s Steven Ruiz about the news of Brian Flores’s lawsuit against the NFL, coaching pipelines, and what could come out of this lawsuit. They follow by listing the most important players heading into the Super Bowl. 

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guests: Diante Lee and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
